articles.author: Lydia Hu
articles.title: US Steel shareholders vote on controversial Nippon deal - Fox Business
articles.description: Japan's Nippon Steel cleared one hurdle in acquiring U.S. Steel with a key vote on Friday, even as lawmakers raise red flags about foreign ownership of an American company.
articles.content:
U.S. Steel shareholders approved the $14.1 billion controversial takeover by Japanese-owned Nippon Steel. 
More than 98% of the shares voted at Friday’s meeting to approve the merger, making up abou… [+6175 chars]

articles.title: The April 8 Total Solar Eclipse: Through the Eyes of NASA - Science@NASA
articles.description: On April 8, 2024, the Moon’s shadow swept across North America, treating millions to a breathtaking view of a total solar eclipse. As the Moon passed in front of the Sun, it revealed the Sun’s wispy white outer atmosphere — the corona. Pictures of total solar…
articles.content: While the eclipse is a powerful reminder of our place in the universe, it also reminds us of our place in our communities. During the alignment of the Sun, Moon, and Earth, people across North Americ… [+146 chars]

articles.title: Box Office: ‘Civil War’ Starts Off With Impressive $2.9M in Thursday Previews - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Alex Garland's controversial movie about the political divide in America easily scored the best preview number ever for A24.
articles.content:
Alex Garland‘s dystopian action movie Civil Warhas started off its North American box office run with an impressive $2.9 million, a record for indie studio and distributor A24.
